title: A quick PSA for those freaking out over the new Rune system because they dumped a ton of IP on them
body:
(myself included, I have 16 rune pages, 6 of which are Mordekaiser specific ones)

Riot is going to compensate us for all the Ip we used on the runes, but that's beside the point.

I see people flipping their collective Sh*t over "riot removing stuff I BOUGHT", saying that it was all for nothing.

Newsflash; We got the privilege to USE THEM, we had an inherent advantage over new players and people with too little IP/RP income to invest into more than two rune pages.
We got to have an advantage, we're not entitled to huge compensations as we already got what we paid for.

So, before I see yet another rant about Riot "TAKING AWAY" stuff we paid for, let me remind you that we got what we paid for. Things change, and it's a step in the right direction, and I'm glad riot is doing this as it's helping the new player experience!

While we aren't legally entitled to any recompense for our spent currency I think it would be exceptionally foolish for Riot not to refund RP and offer some sort of bennie for IP spent on the system.  Players who put money into the game to get runes to be able to play on a level field or to buy champions because they spent their IP on runes are the people who pay the salaries and server costs that let this game succeed, particularly back when playerbase was small and quality-to-cost ratio for aesthetic items was poor so they had to sell access to power in addition to skins.

Creating a precedent where your investment of time or money might be taken away without compensation is bad for convincing players to continue giving you their time and money or distorts player behavior to 'safe' purchases.  Runes and rune pages were presented as permanent purchases not rentals regardless of what the EULA says and while overhauling the system is a good thing, treating customers with respect has always been a core Riot value and I expect they will continue to live up to that.
